mapper.insert: insert into friends(user_id, friend_id, apply) value(#{userId}, #{friendId}, #{apply})
mapper.delete: delete from friends where (user_id=#{userId} and friend_id=#{friendId}) or (user_id=#{friendId} and friend_id=#{userId})
mapper.select: select * from friends where user_id=#{userId} or friend_id#{userId}
